title: Chuppahs
heading: Custom Chuppahs & Rental Services
content:
Dating back to the 16th century, the Huppah (Chuppah) is a symbol of God’s presence at a Jewish wedding ceremony.

For over 25 years, Wildflowers & Co has designed custom Chuppahs and canopies for countless couples on their special day.

While we're happy to customize, Wildflowers & Co also has a wide range of readily available Chuppahs including birch posts (either hand held or free-standing), transparent acrylic, brass and copper, among other designs.

Depending on your needs, Chuppahs can either be rented alone or included as part of a wedding package. Prices will vary based on Chuppah type and décor and a standard install and delivery fee is usually applied. We have experience setting up Chuppahs at dozens of venues across the GTA so you know you're in good hands.

Contact us hello@wildflowers.ca for a quote.

Mazel Tov!
